Herzlich willkommen zum 10-jährigen Jubi: Welcome to the 10th anniversary of Aikido Switzerland
Der Dachverband «Aikido Switzerland» bes: The umbrella organization "Aikido Switzerland" consists of active aikidokas and dojos in which aikido is practiced, promoted and spread. The association is recognized by the Hombu Dojo and ensures the connection with it.
Unser Verband charakterisiert sich durch: Our association is characterized by a variety of individual aikido styles. It is based on mutual respect for personal differences and expressions of Ai, Ki and Do
Wir sind glücklich, dass uns eine Vielza: We are proud to present a variety of Senseis. Each of them will lead two trainings. Some training will be divided. This allows all participants to train with different teachers and offers the opportunity to experience the great expressive diversity of Aikido on this occasion
Die ganze Jubiläumsveranstaltung wird in: The entire Jubilee will take place at St. Jakobshalle

Das Japanfestival kann man frei besuchen: You can visit the Japan festival freely and eat there cheaply.In addition, opposite the St. Jakobshalle is a large shopping area, with many shops and several restaurants
Bei schönem Wetter bietet die unmittelba: By good weather, the immediate surroundings with the Park in Grünen offers a wonderful picnic and relaxation oasis. You will find an olympic swimming pool next to the training hall
Hall 4 und auf dem vorgelagerten Platz b: Hall 4 and on the parking lot. Saturday, June 20th
Es erwartet euch ein vielfältiges japani: Parallel to the jubilee, a Japanese cultural festival will take place, with Japanese delicacies, music and dance, presentations and workshops.
Am Rheinknie zwischen Schweiz, Deutschla: Located on the elbow of the Rhine between Switzerland, Germany and France, the city is characterized by a lively economic and cultural life. The university is full of humanistic tradition. The art and music institutions of the city are world famous. The museums are almost innumerable, some of them unique. Use your visit to discover Basel, it's worth it. In Basel, you can get everywhere comfortably, quickly and cheaply by public transport.
Das «Joggeli», wie die Basler das St Jak: The «Joggeli», as the people of Basel call the St Jakobshalle, can be easily reached by tram no. 14 and 10 as well as by bus 36 and 37 to the stop «St.Jakob». See also the BVB (Basel public transport) website for special offers. BVB website
Die St. Jakobshalle liegt am südöstliche: The St. Jakobshalle is located on the southeastern edge of the city of Basel and is easily accessible by public transport and by car. GPS: St. Jakobshalle Basel
